backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with ordered maps and data models for journeys, locations, ratings, media, travel spots, albums, layouts, schedules, bookmarks, and geoname cities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists detected product features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files to aid build and feature mapping.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that loads root app container and main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React app setup with theming, identity provider, query client, backend debugger, and main map explorer.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin UI for managing journeys, schedules, travel spots, music albums, and geoname data with calendar popovers and CRUD workflows.
Exposes backend actor and debugging utilities to the browser console for development.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums including media uploads, validation, listing, and social media link handling.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Manages city data import, search, pagination, and CRUD operations with a form and file upload parsing for geonames data.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Interactive 10-heart rating component supporting partial fills, hover effects, and click-based fractional ratings.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Three.js-based globe visualization with overlays, labels, flight animations, timezone rendering, and extensive UI/animation controls.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for adding, updating, or deleting location photos with file validation, preview, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel using Internet Identity with login/logout handling, status display, and modal UI.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Leaflet-based map showing travel spots, bookmarks, and media, with custom icons, popups, and multiple data queries.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and social media embeds in a tabbed gallery with YouTube/Instagram URL parsing utilities.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Provides an admin interface to create, edit, delete music albums and upload songs using backend queries and file upload hooks.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Shows a dialog-based music collection browser allowing users to explore albums and select songs for playback.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Implements an audio player bar that handles playback, volume, progress, and song navigation using album data.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Uploads, validates, stores, and verifies GeoJSON timezone data via backend actor and IndexedDB with manual execution steps.
Displays journeys with expandable itineraries and lets users add, edit, and delete schedule items.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: UI to create, edit, list, and delete travel spots, including file uploads and social media links.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows vibes grouped by city, merging bookmarks and travel spots with type-based icons and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Panel for editing website layout preferences such as map settings, display options, and local time display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, identity loading, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks plus utilities for geocoding, country name normalization, and social media URL validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and extensive theme variables for light/dark modes and UI components.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Offers solar declination calculation and includes console-based test cases for astronomical events.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Provides quarter‑hour‑precision timezone offset matching using Intl API on GeoJSON timezone data.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Handles loading, caching, and validation of timezone GeoJSON data using IndexedDB and backend fallback.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements timezone boundary rendering on a 3D globe, including coordinate helpers and offset-based timezone filtering.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Empty placeholder file for a Country Map Explorer page.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Main map explorer page managing search, view modes (2D/3D), globe settings, travel spot focus, and music integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, writing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, layout, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the requirement to add a non-functional 'Map' button next to 'Flying' in the Travelogue without altering existing layouts.
